process-from-payment-to-final-cv.question: How does the process work from payment to final CV?
process-from-payment-to-final-cv.answer: Once you confirm your package and make payment, we send you a short intake form to understand your current role, target roles, and career goals. We then review your existing CV (or career history if you do not have one), draft your new CV, and share it for review. You can request revisions within the agreed timelines until the final version is approved.

pricing-packages-cost.question: How much do your CV packages cost?
pricing-packages-cost.answer: We offer tiered packages based on career level and scope (CV only, CV + Cover Letter, CV + LinkedIn). For current pricing, please see our Pricing page or contact us with your current role and target level for a tailored recommendation.

turnaround-time-cv-delivery.question: How long does it take to receive my CV?
turnaround-time-cv-delivery.answer: Typical turnaround is 3–5 business days from the time we receive your completed intake form and any supporting documents. If you have a tight deadline, let us know in advance so we can advise on rush options where available.

clients-outside-kenya.question: Do you work with clients outside Kenya?
clients-outside-kenya.answer: Yes. We work with clients in Kenya and internationally. We adapt CV formats and content to match your target market (for example, Kenyan, UK, EU, or US-style CVs) while keeping your core achievements and positioning consistent.

who-we-serve.question: Who is cvwriting.co.ke best suited for?
who-we-serve.answer: We support students, recent graduates, mid-career professionals, and senior leaders who want a clear, results-focused CV tailored to their target roles. If you are unsure whether we are the right fit, share your current CV and goals and we will advise honestly.

what-to-provide-to-get-started.question: What do I need to provide to get started?
what-to-provide-to-get-started.answer: Ideally, share your current CV (if you have one), links to 1–3 target job descriptions, and any key achievements you want highlighted. If you do not have a CV yet, we will ask for a brief career history and education summary instead.

payment-methods.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
payment-methods.answer: For Kenyan clients we accept M-Pesa and bank transfer. For international clients we support card payments or other region-appropriate options. Payment instructions are shared in your quote and confirmation email.

refunds-policy.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds-policy.answer: Because our work is a professional service and time-based, we typically do not offer refunds once work has started. However, we do include revisions within the agreed scope to make sure your CV is aligned with your goals.

process-main-steps.question: What are the main steps in your process?
process-main-steps.answer: The process usually follows these steps: (1) Enquiry and brief, (2) Package recommendation and quote, (3) Payment and intake form, (4) Draft CV preparation, (5) Review and revisions, and (6) Final delivery of files.

delayed-feedback.question: What happens if I delay in giving feedback?
delayed-feedback.answer: We keep your project active for a defined period. If feedback is delayed beyond that window, we may need to reschedule your slot. We will always communicate clearly if timelines need to be adjusted.

revisions-included.question: How many revisions are included?
revisions-included.answer: Most packages include a defined number of revision rounds within a set period (for example, 7–14 days). During this time you can request clarifications, refinements, and minor adjustments within the agreed scope.

job-guarantee.question: Do you guarantee that I will get a job?
job-guarantee.answer: We do not guarantee job offers, interviews, or promotions. What we do guarantee is a professionally written CV aligned to your brief, using best-practice structure and content for your target market.

cv-file-formats.question: Which file formats will I receive?
cv-file-formats.answer: You will typically receive your CV in editable DOCX format and a final PDF version. For some packages we may also support additional formats where relevant.

ats-friendly.question: Are your CVs ATS-friendly?
ats-friendly.answer: Yes. We avoid overly complex layouts that can break in applicant tracking systems. We focus on clear structure, correct section ordering, and well-formatted content so your CV is readable by both ATS systems and human reviewers.

data-handling.question: How do you handle my data and documents?
data-handling.answer: We treat your CV and personal information as confidential. Your documents are only used to deliver the service you request, and we do not share them with third parties for marketing.

data-retention.question: How long do you keep my information?
data-retention.answer: We retain your files for a reasonable period to support revisions and future updates, after which they may be archived or deleted in line with our data retention practices. For full details, please see our Privacy Policy.
